What we do

We transform complex data into visually engaging and insightful narratives.

Tailored Data Visualization

We provide custom data visualization solutions to help you understand your data better.

Interactive Dashboards

We create dynamic and interactive dashboards to help you make data-driven decisions effectively.

Advanced AI Analytics

We leverage advanced AI techniques to uncover hidden patterns and trends in your data.

About

Discover the story of our journey.

  • July 2017

    Our Humble Beginnings

    We published ApexCharts.js and it's surrounding libraries which quickly became one of the most popular solutions for building charts on the web.

  • March 2021

    A Firm is Born

    Vizograph Solutions was officially launched, offering specialized data visualization services.

  • October 2022

    Transition to Full Service

    In addition to data visualization, we began incorporating AI to generate more profound insights from your data.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Apex Charts

Making visualizations easy for developers

ApexCharts is a modern charting library that helps developers to create beautiful and interactive visualizations for web pages.

https://apexcharts.com

  • Open Source
  • Category: Developer Tools

Apex Editor

Graph Maker

Beautiful, interactive, and insightful data visualizations using online graph maker.

https://editor.apexcharts.com

  • Client: Infragistics
  • Category: Design Tools

Apex Sankey

JavaScript Sankey Charts

A JavaScript library to create beautiful sankey charts on the web

  • Open-source
  • Category: Developer Tools

Apex Tree

Organizational Chart Library

A library to create customizable organizational charts to illustrate hierarchical structure of a company, highlighting its roles and relationships.

  • Open-source
  • Category: Developer Tools
